arpi.about.contributors.join: Leave your mark and join the growing team of contributors!
arpi.about.contributors.description3: Get started by having a look on
arpi.about.contributors.title: Contributors
arpi.about.contributors.team: Project is developed by GitHub team
arpi.about.title: ArPI - Raspberry PI based home security system
arpi.about.description: Only replacing the main board of your old security system and reuse the installed components (sensors, syren, keypad) you can make your home security system smart. The system has two major components: an adapter component for interfacing between the Raspberry PI and the security system components and the open source software to configure and use the system.
arpi.features.general.title: Features
arpi.features.general.secureaccess.title: Secure access
arpi.features.general.secureaccess.descr: Our goal is to provide a secure and reliable access to your home security system.
arpi.features.general.users.title: Users management
arpi.features.general.users.description: You can manage multiple users with different access levels.
arpi.features.general.remoteaccess.title: Remote access
arpi.features.general.remoteaccess.descr: You can access your home security system from anywhere.
arpi.features.general.notifications.desc: You can receive notifications about the system state and events in SMS and Email
arpi.features.general.poweroutage.title: Power outage
arpi.features.general.poweroutage.descri: You can detect power outages and receive notifications about it.
arpi.features.general.delayedalert.title: Delays
arpi.features.general.delayedalert.descr: You can set a delay time for arming and disarming the system.
arpi.features.general.programmable.title: Programmable outputs
arpi.features.general.programmable.descr: You can use the board for controlling other devices with the programmable outputs.
arpi.features.general.locations.title: Locations/areas
arpi.features.general.locations.descript: You can manage multiple locations or areas
arpi.features.ui.title: User interface
arpi.features.ui.description: Experience complete control of your home security system with our intuitive and user-friendly application, accessible from both mobile devices and desktop computers.
arpi.features.web.title: Web application
arpi.features.web.description: You can use our web application anytime from the internet.
arpi.features.demo.description: You can test a demo version of the ArPI web application in a simulated environment.
arpi.features.android.title: Android application
arpi.features.android.description: You can download our Android application from the Google Play Store.
arpi.features.board.title: Raspberry PI adapter board
arpi.features.channels.title: Channels
arpi.features.channels.description: You can attach 15 sensor to monitor and alert.
arpi.features.channels.silent: Silent alerts without syren based on sensor or system
arpi.features.channels.sensitivity: Suppress sensor noise based on sensor or system
arpi.features.rtc.title: Real time clock
arpi.features.rtc.description: You can attach a real-time clock to have a precise time without internet connection.
arpi.features.ups.title: Power supply
arpi.features.ups.description: You can connect an uninterruptible power supply and detect power outages.
arpi.features.keypad.title: Keypad
arpi.features.keypad.description: You can connect a Wiegand protocol based keypad to control the security system.
arpi.features.keypad.disarm: Depending on your keypad disarming the system with PIN code, RFID card or fingerprint
arpi.features.outputs.title: Outputs
arpi.features.outputs.description: You have two outputs for the syren, two programmable relay outputs and 4 programmable open collector outputs.
arpi.features.outputs.button: Direct control of the output with buttons on the web interface
arpi.features.outputs.state: System or room state dependent output control
arpi.features.gsm.title: GSM
arpi.features.gsm.description: GSM connection for alerting without internet connection.
arpi.features.gsm.notifications: SMS messages and GSM calls based on system events (alert, power outage)
arpi.features.gsm.sms: Reading SMS from the web interface
arpi.versions.hw.title: ArPI board
arpi.versions.hw.subtitle: The Raspberry PI Zero W adapter for interfacing with your home security system
arpi.versions.sw.title: ArPI software
arpi.versions.sw.subtitle: The open source software of the home security system
arpi.versions.sw.v0_16: 2024.11 / v0.16 - Upgrade to 'bookworm' OS version, networking improvements
arpi.versions.sw.v0_15: 2024.09 / v0.15 - GSM calls, improved card registration
arpi.versions.sw.v0_14: 2024.06 / v0.14 - SSH key management, stability improvements

arpi.home.upgrade.description: Make your old security system smart

arpi.order.description: If you want to order an ArPI interface board, please contact us in a message here or on Slack or buy on on Tindie!

arpi.consent.title: Cookie consent
arpi.consent.message: We use cookies to get information about the usage of our website with Google Analytics. Please accept the use of cookies.
